description.value:
Vesk who grew up underground in twisted caverns have more sensitive hearing. They have @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#low-light-vision]{Low-Light Vision} and gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#blindsight]{Blindsight} (sound) 60 feet, but they take a –4 penalty to sight-based @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.gZlg2ZKze0erNLmP]{Perception} checks beyond 60 feet and take a –2 penalty on ranged attack rolls against targets beyond 60 feet in bright light.

This replaces low-light vision.

modifiers.name: Cave Senses
modifiers.notes: Vesk who grew up underground in twisted caverns have more sensitive hearing. They have  Low-Light Vision and gain  Blindsight (sound) 60 feet, but they take a –4 penalty to sight-based  Perception checks beyond 60 feet and take a –2 penalty on ranged attack rolls against targets beyond 60 feet in bright light.
